  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205246</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">With Strings Attached: Hollywood's Gift to a Navajo Family</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn Die Zeichenketten Angebracht Sind: 
Geschenk Hollywoods zu einer Navajo-Familie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Chaînes de caractères Joint : Le 
cadeau de Hollywood à une famille de Navajo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com As Cordas Unidas: Presente de Hollywood 
a uma família do navajo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con Le Stringhe Fissate: Regalo del 
Hollywood ad una famiglia del navajo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τις συμβολοσειρές συνημμένες: Δώρο 
Hollywood σε μια οικογένεια Ναβάχο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con Las Cadenas Asociadas: Regalo de 
Hollywood a una familia de Navajo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students explore issues of culture and identity and learn about Navajo culture by examining the perspectives of those portrayed in the film, Return of Navajo Boy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer 
Ausgaben der Kultur und der Identität und erlernen über 
Navajokultur, indem sie die Perspektiven von denen überprüfen, die 
im Film, Rückkehr des Navajo-Jungen geschildert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants explorent des 
issues de culture et d'identité et se renseignent sur la culture de 
Navajo en examinant les perspectives de ceux dépeints dans le film, 
retour de garçon de Navajo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes exploram 
introduções da cultura e da identidade e aprendem-nas sobre a 
cultura do navajo examinando os perspectives daqueles portrayed na 
película, retorno do menino do navajo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi esaminare le 
emissioni di coltura e dell'identità ed imparano circa la coltura del
navajo esaminando le prospettive di quelli ritratti nella pellicola, 
ritorno del ragazzo del navajo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές ερευνούν τα ζητήματα
του πολιτισμού και της ταυτότητας και μαθαίνουν για τον πολιτισμό 
Ναβάχο με την εξέταση των προοπτικών εκείνοι που απεικονίζονται 
στην ταινία, επιστροφή του αγοριού Ναβάχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes exploran 
aplicaciones la cultura y la identidad y aprenden sobre cultura de 
Navajo examinando las perspectivas de ésos retratados en la 
película, vuelta del muchacho de Navajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
